Key Match Events: Mohamed Bayo scored the first goal for Guinea
Frank Magri headed in the equalizer for Cameroon
Francois Kamano was sent off for Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Yamoussoukro
The match was the first for both teams in the Africa Cup of Nations 2024
Others: The Indomitable Lions failed to register a single shot on target in the first half
Guinea played with 10 men after Francois Kamano's red card
